circumstances: The crew departed Santa Ana in the early morning to follow a training program at Lancaster-General William J. Fox Airport. He was completing several touch-and-goes when control was lost during initial climb. The airplane swerved on runway and eventually crashed. The copilot was seriously injured while the captain was killed.
probable_cause: Ground loop and controlled collision with ground during initial climb after the crew failed to maintain directional control while completing touch and go landing.
